description: Have played this to death, maybe will play again, and with an expansion, just doesn't give me that buzz anymore.
Amazing game, with the cities and knights expansion, it is almost the perfect game!

title: Always have a place in my heart
description: I have definitely gotten to a point where I will never suggest playing catan to a group, I think there are now far too many games that are better/more fun but I will always remember fondly evenings spent negotiating insane deals and despairing at not being able to roll an 8 on two dice whereas 3 came up far too many times for statistics to still be a thing. A great starter game and at the time one of the best games out there.

title: You'll los...
description: You'll lose friends over this, the key of this game is the trading player interaction, Fun enough and plenty of shouting, however if you eventually fall behind the end of this game just gets really boring and disheartening

title: https://co...
description: https://colonist.io/ Seems to be the recommended way to play online - I am derbius there.

title: Extended f...
description: Extended family still like to play this, and I will always play with them, but I think I've personally moved on.

title: Played thi...
description: Played this a lot in the 90's. Feels very outdated, so haven't played for a decade now and probably never will again. Did bring the hobby back in the spotlight though.

title: It's a cla...
description: It's a classic that will always stay in my collection.  I would play this anytime someone wanted to play it.

title: The game t...
description: The game that started it for us. My wife and I often play this 2p variant: http://www.baumfamily.org/dave/settlers.htmlShe simply owns me in this game - help!!!

title: Just retur...
description: Just returned to this after a long absence from the table, and realised why the absence. How many dice rolls came and went where my available actions were limited to passing. So frustrating that there isn't any effective way to mitigate poor dice rolls.

title: A good all...
description: A good all round game. Even if my friend Lynn does win all the time.the game from germany that won 100 000s US hearts.

title: Will play ...
description: Will play it, but tends to run long and get bogged down in midgame as everyone is often just sitting and waiting for needed resources to be produced.

title: Great gate...
description: Great gateway game for just about anyone interested in learning Euro games.

title: Oeh, not g...
description: Oeh, not getin why there's still hype for this game. Dice brakes this game for me. Its probably better the more you play as there has to be something in it. I'd probably love it had I played it before other stuff, now it just - is that it?

title: Classic So...
description: Classic Solid fun, better then Carcassonne in my opinion.
